greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Arithmetic derivative of d(n), the number of divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: dn[0]=0; dn[1]=0; dn[n_]:=Module[{f=Transpose[FactorInteger[n]]}, If[PrimeQ[n], 1, Plus@@(n*f[[2]]/f[[1]])]]; Table[dn[DivisorSigma[0, n]], {n, 150}]
xref: Cf. A000005, A003415 (arithmetic derivative of n).
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Oct 12 2004
